results.name: Lengths of runs of identical terms in A121561.
link: Kerry Mitchell, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2500
example: a(2) = 7 because A121561 begins 0, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1 and the second block of identical terms is 7 ones.
results.author: _Kerry Mitchell_, Aug 07 2006
ext: Name and example edited by _M. F. Hasler_, Jan 07 2019
